name: Push & Pull
description:
I work as a programmer on a game made in Game Lab at the University of Texas at Dallas.

Push and Pull is a 2.5D sidescrolling platformer that uses the elements of pushing and pulling to solve puzzles and navigate hazardous terrain.

A little robot named Bulb finds himself trapped in a mysterious science lab and is determined to escape. Using his powers of pushing and pulling blocks, he will do his best to make it to the outside world. During his journey, he encounters other robots in need of help.

For more information on the development process, check out the wordpress site.
